permissions: Admins can update any samsara vehicle; non-admin users can update samsara vehicles for brokers they are members of.
side_effects: Updates trailer and/or tractor assignments on a samsara vehicle.
validation_notes: The <id> argument is required and must be a samsara vehicle ID. At least one of --trailer or --tractor must be specified. If --trailer or --tractor is provided with an empty value, the corresponding assignment is cleared.
